passwordReset.title: إعادة تعيين كلمة المرور
passwordReset.confirmedTitle: تم إرسال بريد إلكتروني لإعادة تعيين كلمة المرور
passwordReset.confirmedText: لقد أرسلنا إليك بريداً إلكترونياً من طرف {adminEmail} يحتوي على إرشادات لإعادة تعيين كلمة المرور. من فضلك تأكد أن هذا الراسل خارج تصفية البريد العشوائي. إن لم يصل البريد الرجاء اﻹتصال بنا على {supportEmail}. يرجى الملاحظة أن مدة صلاحية الرابط {expiry} ساعات.

userTos.disclaimer: من فضلك راجع {tosLink} و{ppLink} للموافقة على اﻵتي:
userTos.disclaimerUpdate: قمنا بتحديث {tosLink} و{ppLink} - من فضلك راجع عليهم للموافقة على اﻵتي:
userTos.agreePp: انا أوافق على أن مؤسسة ميدان Meedan تعالج المعلومات الشخصية التي اخترت مشاركتها ، بما في ذلك المعلومات التي تكشف عن أصل عرقي ، أو الآراء السياسية ، أو المعتقدات الدينية أو الفلسفية ، أو عضويتي في النقابات ، أو الصور الفوتوغرافية ، أو المعلومات المتعلقة بميولِي الجنسية. سيتم حذف هذه المعلومات إذا حذفت حسابي كما هو مذكور في سياسة الخصوصية.

teamTasks.confirmDeleteBlurb: You are about to delete the selected tasks from {itemsNumber, plural, one {1 item} other {# items}}. If you proceed, the answers to these tasks will also be deleted.

reportDesigner.textError: You must either provide text for the report or uncheck the 'Report text' box
reportDesigner.cannotPublish: Fill in at least the report text or image to publish your report. Make sure to create a report for the primary language ({language}).
addLanguageAction.title: Choose a new language
statusListItem.confirmDefaultBody: {language} will become the default one to respond to users who interact with the bot in any other languages than the ones added to this list.
statusListItem.confirmDeleteBody1: All content in {language} will stop being sent, and the default language will be used instead.
statusListItem.confirmDeleteBody2: This includes content in the Tipline bot, Statuses, and Report.
languagesComponent.title: Content languages
languagesComponent.blurb: Add new languages to your workspace in order to create reports, tipline bots and statuses in multiple languages when communicating with users.
translationNeededDialog.title: Status translation needed
translationNeededDialog.body: In order to make {language} the default language, you must first translate all existing statuses into {language} in the Statuses setting tab.
ruleToolbar.deleteConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
ruleToolbar.leaveConfirmationText: If you continue, you will lose your changes.
rulesTableHead.name: Name
rulesTableToolbar.selected: {numSelected, plural, zero {} one {1 selected} two {} few {} many {} other {# selected}}
rulesTableToolbar.title: {numRules, plural, zero {} one {1 rule} two {} few {} many {} other {# rules}}
rulesTableToolbar.deleteConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete these rules?
smoochBotSelectReport.dialogDescription: Search for the title of the item that you want to send as a report. The bot will reply to the user with this report. The report must be completed before you can search for it here.
smoochBot.title: Design your bot
smoochBot.descriptionGreeting: The first message that is sent to the user. It introduces your organization and the service you provide through this bot. This message is automatically followed by the Main menu.
smoochBot.descriptionMainMenu: A menu asking the user to choose between a set of options. This message automatically follows the Greeting message.
smoochBot.descriptionSecondaryMenu: An optional menu asking the user to choose from a set of options. When a user replies with one of the options, the bot can send a report or direct them to another bot message.
smoochBot.descriptionQueryPrompt: The message asking the user to submit content for a fact-check.
smoochBot.descriptionQueryReceived: The confirmation sent to the user after a valid query from the user has been received.
smoochBot.descriptionOptionNotAvailable: The message sent if the user response to a menu is not a valid menu scenario.
smoochBot.descriptionReportUpdated: The message sent to the user when status of a report has changed. The report must be completed for this message to be sent.
smoochBot.descriptionInvalidFormat: An automatic message sent to the user when they have sent a file that is not supported by Check.
smoochBot.descriptionInactive: This message is sent to any user that has sent a message to the tipline when the Check Message bot is set to inactive.
smoochBot.descriptionTos: This message immediately follows any report sent to the user and should contain a link to the Check Terms of Service.
smoochBot.placeholderGreeting: Hi! Welcome to [Name of your organization]’s fact-checking bot. We fact-check claims, videos and images related to topics such as politics, health, finance, and technology.
smoochBot.placeholderMainMenu:
📌*Main Menu*

*Reply 1* (or 🔍) to submit a request for a fact-check about an article, video, image, or other content.
*Reply 2* (or 🦠) to get the latest information about coronavirus disease (COVID-19)
smoochBot.placeholderSecondaryMenu:
*Information about Coronavirus disease (COVID-19)* 🦠

👉*Reply with any one of the following numbers (or emoji) to get information about that topic:*

*1:* How do I protect myself and/or my family? 👨‍👩‍👧
*2:* I think I might be getting sick 🤒
*3:* How can I handle stress associated with COVID-19? ❤️
*4:* Information about cases and recoveries globally 📊
*5:* Latest updates from the World Health Organization 🌐

*Reply 0* to get back to the *Main Menu* 📌
smoochBot.placeholderQueryPrompt:
*Please enter the question, link, picture, or video that you want fact-checked,* followed by any context or additional questions related to that item. Your request will be sent to fact-checkers about 30 seconds after you have sent your last message.

*Reply 0 (or 📌)* to go back to the *Main Menu*
smoochBot.placeholderQueryReceived:
Thank you! Your request has been received. Responses are being aggregated and sorted, and we're working on fact-checking your questions.

✔️*Follow this link for an updated list of common questions that we have fact-checked:* [ Link to a page of fact-checks on your website ]

👉*Reply with any text* to get back to the *Main Menu* 📌
smoochBot.placeholderOptionNotAvailable: 🤖I'm sorry, I didn't understand your message. Please try again!
smoochBot.placeholderReportUpdated: ❗️The fact-check that we sent to you has been *updated* with new information:
smoochBot.placeholderInvalidFormat:
❌Sorry, we can't accept this type of message for verification at this time.

We can accept most images, videos, links, text messages, and shared WhatsApp messages.
smoochBot.placeholderInactive:
❌Thank you for your message. Our fact-checking service is currently *inactive.*

Contact us at *[email or other contact]* for further inquiries.
smoochBot.placeholderTos: This service is provided under the following terms: %{tos}
deleteStatusDialog.statusInUseTitle: You need to change the status of {itemsCount, plural, one {one item} other {# items}} to delete this status
deleteStatusDialog.statusInUseMessage: There {itemsCount, plural, one {is one item} other {are # items}} with the status {statusLabel} that must be changed to other statuses before deleting this status.
deleteStatusDialog.alternatively: Alternatively, you can change each item status individually.
deleteStatusDialog.itemsPublishedMessage: {publishedCount, plural, one {One of those items is currently published.} other {# of those items are currently published.}} Upon moving them to another status, the reports will be paused. Please review those items to re-publish them.
editStatusDialog.title: Add a new status
statusesComponent.error: Sorry, an error occurred while updating the statuses. Please try again and contact {supportEmail} if the condition persists.
statusesComponent.title: {statuses_count, plural, one {1 status} other {# statuses}}
statusesComponent.blurb: The status title is visible when reports are sent to users.
statusesComponent.blurbSecondary: Translate statuses in secondary languages in order to display them in local languages in your fact checking reports.
translateStatuses.missingTranslationsBod: Some statuses are missing translations. Users may not be able to read untranslated statuses.
